{"title":"Page 4","subjec":{},"descri":{},"creato":{},"publis":{},"date":{},"year":{},"format":{},"reposi":{},"collec":{},"reposa":{},"rights":{},"digitb":{},"langua":{},"topics":{},"cite":{},"notes":{},"notesa":{},"source":{},"box":{},"folder":{},"identi":{},"relati":{},"findin":{},"catalo":{},"type":{},"full":"THE PRACTICABILITY OF THE ROUTE.
Washington, the proposed present terminus of
the road, is situated in the parish of St. Landry,
on the west bank of the Court-a-bleau, on a beautiful plateau of land, about thirty feet above the
highest high water level of the Mississippi river.
From this point, the same plateau of land is continued down as far as Berwick's Bay, a distance,
by way of the road, of eighty-five miles, but
gently dipping until it reaches the latter point,
where the elevation of the land is not more than
ten or twelve feet above the high water level of
the Mississippi river. On the route, we pass
through Opelousas, Grand Coiitcau, Vermilion-
villc, St. Martinsville, New Iberia, Franklin, Cen-
treville and Pattersonville. The parishes interested in this part of the Road, are. St. Landry,
Calcsftieu, Lafayette, \ ermilion, St. Martin and
St. Mary's. A portion of the parish of Rapides,
on Bayou Bceuf and Bayou Robert, will use this
road when completed, and on which the principal
sugar plantations of that parish arc found.
Outside of the State of Kentucky, so beautiful
a country I have never seen as is this whole line ;
and I was filled with astonishment at finding such
'a region in the State of Louisiana, but which
explained itself ou finding it completely cut off,
as it is, from direct communication with the
Mississippi river and New Orleans, by swamps,
trembling prairies, lakes and tortuous bayous. It
is. from its southern exposure to the sea breeze,
perhaps the most healthy portion of the American
continent. By the census of 1840, it appears
there are more centenarians in this particular","fullrs":{},"find":"2050.jp2","dmaccess":{},"dmimage":{},"dmcreated":"2012-01-18","dmmodified":"2012-01-18","dmoclcno":{},"dmrecord":"2049","restrictionCode":"1","cdmfilesize":"512101","cdmfilesizeformatted":"0.49 MB","cdmprintpdf":"0","cdmhasocr":"1","cdmisnewspaper":"0"}
